item.title: C++ Notes
item.description: Introduction These are my notes about C++. Mostly experiments and running examples with org-babel within Emacs. Ideally, if you want to benefit from this, you should write, run, and understand the examples yourself.

item.title: C++ Development environment in Emacs
item.description: Introduction This set up already starts with wsl (version 2) already installed and emacs as well. Emacs on windows with WSL2 | Nasser's personal website
